data.name: 30XX Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack to 30XX!

It contains all 39 tracks from the game and the Editor together: 26 tracks from the game, 4 bonus tracks not in use, and 9 Editor tracks, in both 320kbps MP3 and FLAC formats.

While we're in Early Access, we'll periodically be adding new tracks to the game. When we do, we'll also update this Soundtrack, and you'll get them automatically.
